description:
MVM Next app: áram- és földgázügyintézés (MVM Next Energiakereskedelmi Zrt. egyetemes 
energiaszolgáltatás)


- Mérőállást diktálhat és lekérdezhet.
- Bankkártyával befizetheti számláit.
- Megbízott fizetői státusz is kialakítható a szerződött ügyfél hozzájárulásával.
- Igényelheti a környezetbarát e-számlát.
- Értesítést kérhet új számláról, diktálási időszakról.


Az ügyfélvisszajelzéseket is figyelembe véve folyamatosan fejlesztjük és bővítjük az
alkalmazást. Ügyfeleink adatainak védelme érdekében a mobilapplikáció nem használható egyes 
jogosultságkiterjesztett (jailbreakelt) készülékeken.


Az MVM Next mobilalkalmazás a működéséhez és a jobb felhasználói élmény nyújtásához sütiket 
(cookie-kat) használ, melyek használatához Ön az alkalmazás letöltésével hozzájárul.
A cookie-k használatáról részletes információt ezen a linken talál: 
https://onlineugyintezes.mvmnext.hu/attachments/9759752

developer: General Logistics Systems Czech Republic s.r.o.
description:
A GLS Hungary applikációja forradalmasítja a csomagfeladással és -fogadással kapcsolatos élményt. A GLS alkalmazással egyszerűen és kényelmesen intézheted csomagjaidat, legyen szó belföldi vagy nemzetközi szállításról. A rugalmasság és az áttekinthetőség az alkalmazás fő erényei, melyekkel időt és energiát takaríthatsz meg a mindennapjaid során.

CSOMAGFELADÁS MAGÁNSZEMÉLYKÉNT
Most már magánszemélyként is tudsz csomagot küldeni a GLS appon keresztül - tehát már minden, csomagküldéshez kapcsolódó ügyedet egy helyen intézheted!

AUTOMATIKUS CSOMAGKÖVETÉS SZEMÉLYRE SZABVA
Vásárlásaiddal nem kell többé külön bajlódnod. Az alkalmazás lehetővé teszi, hogy hozzáadd azokat az e-mail-címeket, amelyeket különböző online áruházakban használsz. Így a GLS-csomagjaid automatikusan megjelennek az alkalmazásban, anélkül, hogy manuálisan be kellene vinned az adatokat. Az automatizált nyomon követés érthető, egyszerű és gyors megoldást nyújt, így mindig átláthatod a csomagod státuszát.

RÉSZLETES INFORMÁCIÓK A CSOMAGOK ÁLLAPOTÁRÓL
Kíváncsi vagy, hol jár a csomagod? A GLS app minden szükséges adatot közöl, hogy ne kelljen bizonytalanságban várakoznod. Az alkalmazás naprakész információkat biztosít a csomag hollétéről, a kiszállítás várható idejéről, és lehetőséget ad arra is, hogy gyorsan és egyszerűen módosítsd a kiszállítás helyszínét vagy időpontját, ha az éppen megváltozna. 

ÉLŐ CSOMAGKÖVETÉS
Az appon belül követheted a csomagod aktuális állapotát, továbbá házhoz szállítás esetén csekkolhatod a futár helyzetét és hogy hány megállóra van tőled. 

AZ APPON BELÜL MEGTUDHATOD:
- a feladó nevét,
- a pontos szállítási címet,
- a csomagszámot,
- a csomag aktuális státuszát,
- fizetési státuszodat.
Ha szükséges, egyetlen érintéssel intézheted a változtatásokat, így a kiszállítás mindig igazodik az igényeidhez.

GLS CSOMAGAUTOMATÁK ÉS ÁTVÉTELI PONTOK KERESÉSE -> GLS AUTOMATÁK ÉS CSOMAGPOTOK KERESÉSE 
Elfoglalt mindennapokkal küzdesz, vagy egyszerűen csak rugalmasabb megoldást keresel? A GLS Hungary több mint 2000 csomagautomatával és több mint 1000 csomagponttal rendelkezik országszerte. Az applikáció térképes keresője segít megtalálni a lakhelyedhez legközelebbi GLS Automatát vagy GLS CsomagPontot.

Ha csomagod megérkezett a kiválasztott helyszínre, értesítést kapsz. Automata esetén az alkalmazáson keresztül elérheted az átvételhez szükséges átvételi kódod és a nyitáshoz használható QR-kódot is, eldöntheted, melyiket használod, neked melyik az egyszerűbb.  Ezt egy koppintással másolhatod vagy meg is oszthatod családtagjaiddal. Ha csomagodat csomagpontra rendelted, akkor értesíteni fogunk annak érkezéséről. A folyamat segít, hogy akkor és úgy vehesd át a csomagod, amikor az számodra a legkényelmesebb.

SZEMÉLYRE SZABOTT BEÁLLÍTÁSOK
A GLS alkalmazás lehetőséget biztosít arra, hogy elmentsd kedvenc átvételi pontjaidat és a leggyakrabban használt címeidet. Ha gyakran vársz csomagot, ez az opció időt takarít meg és gördülékenyebbé teszi a csomagfogadást. Soha nem volt még ilyen egyszerű a rendeléseid kezelése!

ARCHÍV CSOMAGLISTÁD EGY HELYEN
A GLS applikációval lehetőséged van korábbi csomagjaidat is visszanézni. Az archivált csomaglistád segít átlátni a korábbi rendeléseket, legyen szó munkáról vagy magánjellegű csomagküldésről. Az adatok mindig kéznél lesznek, amikor szükséged van rájuk.


MIÉRT VÁLASZD A GLS APPOT?
A GLS Hungary applikációt arra tervezték, hogy megfeleljen a modern felhasználói igényeknek. Az átláthatóság, egyszerűség és a gyors hozzáférhetőség mind azt a célt szolgálják, hogy a csomagfogadás a lehető legkönnyebb legyen számodra. Bárhol is jársz, a GLS app mindig rendelkezésedre áll, hogy naprakész információkat nyújtson és biztosítsa a teljes ellenőrzést csomagjaid felett.

Töltsd le most a GLS Hungary applikációt, és tapasztald meg, milyen kényelmes a csomagjaid kezelése egyetlen helyen!

Az Instacarnak csak egy rendszámra van szüksége ahhoz, hogy információt adjon az ellenőrizni kívánt használt személyautóról.

Hogyan működik?
1. A rendszám lekérdezéshez add meg az autó rendszámát.
2. Az Instacar megmutatja a személyautó alapadatait – ingyen. Többek között az óraállásokat, műszaki érvényesség dátumát, évjáratot stb.
3. Az Instacar autó érték kalkulátora kiszámolja a használt autó becsült piaci értékét.

Az app becsült piaci értéket M1, M1G kategóriájú, maximum 7 üléses, legfeljebb 22 éve forgalomba helyezett személyautókra, a Magyarországon gazdát cserélő leggyakoribb 582 típusra számol.
Az érték az adott jármű korának és kilométerfutásának megfelelő normál műszaki és esztétikai állapotú autó értékét adja vissza.

Whether you’re connecting with your community for an upcoming activity or working with teammates on a project, Microsoft Teams helps bring people together so that they can get things done. It’s the only app that has communities, events, chats, channels, meetings, storage, tasks, and calendars in one place—so you can easily connect and manage access to information. Get your community, family, friends, or workmates together to accomplish tasks, share ideas, and make plans. Join audio and video calls in a secure setting, collaborate in documents, and store files and photos with built-in cloud storage. You can do it all in Microsoft Teams. 

Easily connect with anyone: 
• Skype is now part of Teams. Continue where you left off with your chats, calls and contacts in Microsoft Teams Free. 
• Meet securely with communities, teammates, family, or friends.
• Set up a meeting within seconds and invite anyone by sharing a link or calendar invite. 
• Chat 1-1 or to your entire community, @mention people in chats to get their attention. 
• Create a dedicated community to discuss specific topics and make plans*.
• Work closely and collaborate by keeping conversations organized by specific topics and projects with teams and channels.
• Video or audio call anyone directly in Teams or instantly convert a group chat to a call. 
• Use GIFs, emojis, and message animations to express yourself when words aren’t enough.
 
Accomplish plans and projects together: 
• Send photos and videos in chats to quickly and easily share important moments.
• Use cloud storage to access shared documents and files on the go. 
• Organize shared content in a community — events, photos, links, files —so you don’t have to waste time searching*. 
• Get the most out of your meetings by using screen share, whiteboard, or breakout in virtual rooms.
• Manage access to information and ensure the right people have access to the right info, even when people join and leave projects.
• Use task lists to stay on top of projects and plans - assign tasks, set due dates, and cross off items to keep everyone on the same page. 

Designed to give you peace of mind: 
• Securely collaborate with others while maintaining control over your data.
• Keep communities safe by allowing owners to remove inappropriate content or members*.
• Enterprise-level security and compliance you expect from Microsoft 365**. 

*Available when using Microsoft Teams with your Microsoft account.

**Commercial features of this app require a paid Microsoft 365 commercial subscription or a trial subscription of Microsoft Teams for work. If you’re not sure about your company’s subscription or the services you have access to, visit Office.com/Teams to learn more or contact your IT department. 

By downloading Teams, you agree to the license (see aka.ms/eulateamsmobile) and privacy terms (see aka.ms/privacy). For support or feedback, email us at mtiosapp@microsoft.com. EU Contract Summary: aka.ms/EUContractSummary

Consumer Health Data Privacy Policy   
https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2259814

Welcome among the users of „Mobile ticket” application!
 
Important information about the app:
• Free to download for iOS operating system
• Operating systems supported:  iOS 16.0 (or more recent versions)
• Simple registration procedure optimized to mobile devices
 
Download the app and follow the registration process. Use your debit card or top-up your balance in for  purchase.
 
Purchase your ticket or pass, even just before boarding.  Upon boarding, please validate your purchased ticket by scanning the validation code placed either on outside or inside of the vehicle or at the subway entrance. Please show the appeared individual graphic to the bus driver or controller for control.
 
Should you meet a controller, please show the QR code version of the ticket or the pass on your mobile device, which is controlled by the personnel.
 
Please make sure your mobile phone is charged and has internet access.
In case you do not sign out of the application, the verified tickets are available for control scanning, while the ticket validation and visual controlling function are not available.
 
For more information on the mobile app, please contact our colleagues on the 06-36-889-889 phone number or on the ugyfelszolgalat@nmzrt.hu e-mail address.

Find the job that's right for you. With the LinkedIn app, you can nurture relationships, stay up-to-date with business news, and grow your professional network. Begin your job search equipped with powerful tools to help you grow professionally, such as job alerts and interview tips, all conveniently available in one app. 



Elevate your career by building a professional profile to showcase your work or company and find your next job. Stay updated on the latest workplace and industry news.


LinkedIn simplifies professional social networking, job searching, and job hiring. Utilize the LinkedIn app to connect with industry leaders, share articles, engage in conversations with fellow professionals, and increase your chances of securing jobs in your field.

LinkedIn simplifies professional social networking, job searching, and job hiring. Utilize the LinkedIn app to connect with industry leaders, share content that helps you grow, engage in conversations with fellow professionals, and increase your chances of securing jobs in your field.


Find freelance, local, or remote jobs. Easily apply with your professional profile in just a few steps and take the next steps in enhancing your next career.


Why You’ll Love LinkedIn:
- Job search: Find your next job and the ideal workplace for you. Apply using your LinkedIn profile and/or resume and get hired.
- Business news: Write your own posts and share articles with your connections.
- Career tools: Get job alerts and full job listings tailored to you.
- Social networking: Create your own profile, find business connections, and highlight your skills within the business community.


Take the first steps in growing your career today with LinkedIn.


LinkedIn App Features:

JOB SEARCH AND CAREER FINDER
• Local jobs or remote: Start your job search and find the right career for yous
• Career finder: Seek jobs and new business opportunities for every type of profession.
• Freelancer or contractor? Discover freelance opportunities and contracts in your field.
• Job alerts: Get notified when new jobs are posted from the companies you follow.


BUILD YOUR COMMUNITY
• Grow your career: Follow companies and professionals to see updates and content on the latest topics.
• Build your professional network by connecting with new business contacts and easily find industry leaders
• Social networking for businesses: Showcase your company or product to find new opportunities.


BUSINESS NEWS
• Get the latest business news and stay current on industry trends every industry.
• Follow industry leaders for news that is relevant to your career.
• Share articles and posts with the LinkedIn community and your business contacts.


PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
• Keep your LinkedIn profile up-to-date as an online resume and CV to highlight your career experience and increase your chances of getting hired.
• Share your accomplishments, job responsibilities, and skills on your professional profile.


SOCIAL NETWORKING
• Grow your business connections and join groups that share and support your goals.
• Connect to the largest social network of professionals from around the globe.


Take the first steps in finding the right job for you!


Build your profile, apply for your next job, and connect with recruiters, professionals, and companies you’re interested in. LinkedIn helps you start and finish your job search.


Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.


We ask for a few permissions when you use this app. Here’s why: http://linkd.in/1l0S8YZ



-



LinkedIn members have the option to verify their identity by securely uploading a government ID and/or taking a live selfie using certain trusted partners. For more information about the data collected by our trusted partners through this process and the periods for which it will be retained, see: https://www.linkedin.com/help/linkedin/answer/a1359065

Reimagine teamwork with Zoom Workplace, an AI-first, open collaboration platform that combines team chat, meetings, phone*, whiteboard, calendar, mail, docs, and more. Use Zoom Workplace for iOS with any free or paid Zoom license.

And with your Pro or Business Zoom license you have access to AI Companion woven throughout Zoom Workplace. You can get caught up quickly with a summary and key points from your unread messages, draft new content, and keep conversations focused and impactful. It’s your personal assistant across Zoom Workplace, available at no additional cost with your paid Zoom license, available wherever you are from your mobile device. 

BE MORE PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO WITH AI COMPANION* ON YOUR MOBILE DEVICE
Quickly get prepared for upcoming meetings
Have AI Companion* generate a first draft of content 
Get a summary of your unread Team Chat messages

STREAMLINE COMMUNICATIONS WITH A SINGLE APP

Place and receive phone calls or send SMS text messages*

IMPROVE PRODUCTIVITY

BOUNCE BETWEEN LOCATIONS
Move a live meeting or call seamlessly between devices with one tap

WORK SAFELY ON THE GO
Stay focused on the road with Apple CarPlay support

AI Companion may not be available for all regions and industry verticals. Some features not currently available across all regions or plans and are subject to change.

UPGRADE YOUR FREE ACCOUNT TO ZOOM WORKPLACE PRO AND GET AI COMPANION INCLUDED 
Host unlimited meetings up to 30 hours each
Record meetings to the cloud (up to 10GB)
Assign meeting co-hosts and schedulers

Your Zoom Workplace Pro subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial or the plan billing period. After you start your subscription, you can manage it from either App Store settings or iOS settings. The amount charged to the payment method in your App Store account will vary by the plan you select and your country. The plan price will be displayed before you start your free trial or confirm your purchase.

Vásárolj kényelmesen, mobiltelefonod segítségével Telekom havi számládra vagy univerzális egyenlegedre. Amennyiben szoktál parkolni, lottózni, autópálya-matricát vásárolni vagy tömegközlekedési eszközön utazni, akkor ezt az alkalmazást Neked találták ki! A Mobilvásárlás alkalmazás használatával ugyanis mindezeket sokkal kényelmesebben és gyorsabban megteheted mobiloddal, SMS-ek elküldése nélkül parkolhatsz, vásárolhatsz e-matricát vagy közlekedési mobiljegyeket, bérleteket.

-Autópálya-matricát vásárolhatsz és parkolhatsz Magyarország területén mindössze néhány érintéssel, ráadásul rendszámodat csak az első alkalommal kell megadnod, az alkalmazás ugyanis megjegyzi a korábbi vásárlásnál használt rendszámokat.
-Fogadhatsz az Ötös-, a Hatos- és a Skandináv lottó, Eurojackpot, Kenó, Puttó, Totó játékokon. Így nem kell lottózót keresned, a megszokott számaidat a fogadási időszakon belül Telekom által lefedett területről bárhonnan elküldheted. Utoljára megadott tippjeid az alkalmazás megjegyzi, hogy még gyorsabb legyen a kedvenc számok megjátszása, illetve lehetősége van véletlenszerű számok megjátszására is.
-2 perc szükséges mindössze ahhoz, hogy közlekedési jegyet, bérletet vásárolj és járműre szállhass Budapesten vagy vidéken! 




Customers of Telekom Hungary can use this app to purchase e-vignettes for Hungarian highways. Mobile-tickets and passes for travelling are also available through the app for all over the country including Budapest transportation. Start-stop parking service can be used easily with the help of the zone-map, parking tickets are presented in the app without SMS sending. Also you can play Hungarian Lottery games with SMS sending.

Meet iScanner, a top-rated document scanner and management tool. Loved by millions for its speed, intuitive design, and high-quality scans. Built on 10+ years of experience.

With this document scanner, you can scan everything, from receipts and ID cards to assignments and business contracts. Thanks to our in-house AI technology, it delivers clean, precise, and distortion-free results. Just scan your document and export it as a PDF, JPG, DOC, XLS, PPT, or TXT file. Whether you’re a remote worker, business professional, student, teacher, or anyone on the go, our scanner is built for you.

With over 125 million users worldwide, iScanner is a complete AI-powered digital office, right on your iPhone or iPad. Need a bigger screen? Use the web version to manage your scanned files.

Here’s what you’ll get:

AI-POWERED DOCUMENT SCANNER
– Improve scan quality with color correction and noise reduction
– Have document borders detected and adjusted automatically
– Straighten pages and fix curved or skewed scans
– Remove fingerprints, folds, and distortions

ALL-IN-ONE FREE DOCUMENT EDITOR AND FILE MANAGER
– Sign your scan manually or insert a signature from an image
– Mark up documents and blur or cover sensitive text
– Add text to forms or autofill documents using custom templates 
– Split your scan into separate pages or merge documents into one
– Rotate and reorganise pages, number pages, and insert footers
– Organize files into folders and move them with drag & drop 

IN-HOUSE OCR & AI PDF ASSISTANT
– Recognize text in 20+ languages, using fast, in-house OCR built into the scanner
– Instantly copy text and images from scanned paper documents
– Convert scans into editable DOC or TXT formats with one tap
– Search PDF files by file name or by text within the document
– Use AI Chat with your PDFs to summarize, translate, rewrite, or ask questions about scanned and recognized text

SECURE CROSS-PLATFORM ACCESS
– Store your documents in a secure AWS cloud
– Sync files and folders across all your devices
– Access, transfer, and view your files from any platform or web browser, anytime
– Use one subscription for our scanner across all your devices
– Import files from Gmail, Google Drive, and Apple Files

ON-DEVICE PRIVACY & PROTECTION
– Keep confidential documents stored directly on your device (with no access for developers or third parties)
– Protect the app and folders with a PIN, Face ID, or Touch ID
– Password-protect your PDFs and set custom expiration dates for shared links 
– Set up a decoy password to block unwanted access with a fake login 

MULTI-MODE SCANNER FOR EVERY TASK
– VARIOUS DOCUMENTS: Use the document scanner to scan business, school, or personal files like contracts, school assignments, or handwritten notes
– ID DOCUMENTS: Create secure copies of your passport, ID card, and driver’s license
– MATH: Solve complex equations using AI
– AREA: Measure object dimensions and calculate area
– COUNT: Automatically detect and count similar objects
– QR CODE: Instantly read any QR code with your device’s camera

SUSTAINABILITY IN ACTION
Since 2015, iScanner has helped millions cut paper use and build eco-conscious habits. With our scanner, users can track their actual impact on nature and save hundreds of trees every day by replacing prints with digital copies. Join them and earn eco certificates for going paperless!

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
• iScanner Pro unlocks all scanner features
• You won’t be charged until purchase confirmation
• Your subscription will auto-renew 24 hours before its expiration date
• Manage or cancel your subscription anytime in your App Store settings

Privacy policy: http://iscanner.com/mobileapp/privacy
Terms of use: http://iscanner.com/mobileapp/terms

We’d love to hear from you! Please leave a review to help us make our document scanner even better. You can also get in touch with us at http://iscannerapp.com/scanner/support.

Grow your business and connect with more people with Meta Business Suite. Use this app to: 


• Create, schedule and manage posts and stories across your Facebook Page and Instagram account
• Connect with more customers by responding to all of your messages and comments in one place – you can even automate responses to save time
• View insights about how people are interacting with your posts, stories and ads so that you can create content that resonates with them
• View your notifications and to-do list so that you can stay on top of what matters most

Discover the Profession.hu job search mobile application, where you can instantly stay informed about the latest job offers! A simple and effective way to search for jobs anytime, anywhere.
We notify you immediately about new job offers that match your interests if you save your job search criteria as notifications.
You can apply directly to advertised jobs by logging into the app with your Profession.hu registered account.
Haven’t uploaded your resume? Save the job listing on your mobile and apply later from any device.

Main features of the Profession app:

- Registration through the application
- Login with your web credentials
- Apply for job postings directly from the app
- Detailed search functions: keyword, industry, position, location
- Save your search criteria
- Save job offers
 - Share job offers via email or social media

Why Profession.hu?
Profession.hu is a reliable and trusted job portal in Hungary. It connects job seekers and employers by providing a wealth of useful, verified information about the labor market, helping both parties make well-informed decisions. It is the expert in online job searching and recruitment in Hungary.
In 2023, Profession.hu was awarded the Family-Friendly Workplace title and once again won the Best Workplace award.
Job seekers can receive personalized job alerts as soon as a job that matches their needs becomes available.
After uploading their resume, employers can easily find them. By browsing resume templates, they can use the resume builder to quickly create their professional CV and apply successfully. Once uploaded to the CV database, employers can reach out to them with the latest job opportunities.
Companies post job opportunities daily in Budapest, rural areas, and abroad, ensuring a continuous stream of available positions.
If you are looking for home office, remote work, part-time jobs, or student jobs, you can find options that match your current situation.
With up-to-date calculators, employees can calculate their salary and leave days, helping them stay informed.
If you're considering changing jobs, you can get job search advice and even access a resignation letter template for assistance.
With the mobile application, finding a job is quick and easy, and through our blog and social media platforms, we keep you informed with the latest updates.

A NAV-Mobil-alkalmazással könnyedén megfizetheti gépjárműadóját, ellenőrizheti adószámláját, megtekintheti foglalkoztatási adatait. Amennyiben szükséges igazolást kérhet adóazonosító jeléről. Ezen felül könnyedén hozzájuthat a legfrissebb adózási információkhoz, és még sok hasznos funkció közül választhat. Megtalálja például az adózási határidőket, az Ügyfélszolgálatok nyitvatartását, elérhetőségeit, de utazás előtt azt is megnézheti, hogy mit hozhat magával poggyászában. 

Az alkalmazás megjelenése személyre szabható, a nyitóképernyő állítható ikonos és képes nézetre is, valamint elérhető sötét módban is.

Ízelítő a tartalomból:

Gépjárműadó
Néhány koppintással könnyedén megfizetheti aktuális gépjárműadóját.

Adószámla lekérdezés
Megnézheti összesített adószámla egyenlegét, illetve letöltheti annak tételes részleteit.

Foglalkoztatási adatok
Megtekintheti aktuális foglalkoztatási jogviszony adatait, valamint a bér és a járulék adatait.

Igazolás az adóazonosító jelről
Az adóazonosító jelről szóló igazolást tölthet le hitelesített PDF formátumban.

Hírek
Itt olvashatja a legfrissebb híreket, adózással kapcsolatos aktuális, hasznos információkat.

Ügyfélszolgálatok 
A menüpontban megtalálja a Nemzeti Adó- és Vámhivatal összes Ügyfélszolgálatát budapesti és megyei bontásban, azok elérthetőségét, nyitvatartását. A helymeghatározás segítségével megnézheti hol van az önhöz legközelebbi Ügyfélszolgálat, ahová akár időpontot is foglalhat. 

Adózók lekérdezése
Ebben a menüpontban a NAV nyilvános adózói adatbázisaiban kereshet, az áfaalanyokról, a végrehajtás alatt álló és a köztartozásmentes adózókról tájékozódhat. Megnézheti saját adatait, sőt akár üzleti partnerei megbízhatóságát is ellenőrizheti az egyszerű lekérdezőfelületen.

TEÁOR
Az egyéni vállalkozók és társas vállalkozások NAV által nyilvántartott tevékenységei kérdezhetők le ezen a felületen, illetve külön kereső segít a TEÁOR- és a szakmakódok konvertálásában.

Ingatlankalkulátor
Az ingatlankalkulátor segítségével kiszámolhatja, hogy kell-e az ingatlan eladása után adót fizetnie, és ha igen, tájékoztató jelleggel azt is, hogy mekkora összeget. 

Információs füzetek
Ezen az oldalon csaknem 100, a NAV szakemberei által összeállított tájékoztatót olvashat a legkülönfélébb adózási témákban. 

Adótraffipax
A menüpontban a NAV honlapján előzetesen közzétett ellenőrzésekről tájékozódhat.

Üzemanyagárak
Az üzemanyag-elszámoláshoz lehet hasznos, hogy egy koppintással elérhetők az alkalmazásban az aktuális üzemanyagárak. 

Utastájékoztató (Travel Guide)
A legfontosabb utazási szabályok mellett egy kalkulátort is talál, mellyel kiszámíthatja, hogy a behozni kívánt termékek után van-e fizetési kötelezettsége. 
Az Utastájékoztató 10 nyelven érhető el (angol, német, ukrán, szerb, horvát, orosz, román, török, kínai).

Find work that fits your life from thousands of available shifts and earn flexibly! Sign up today, start working tomorrow.

Giggle connects gig workers with businesses in the hospitality, logistics and retail sectors on a real-time platform:
- Every shift has transparent working hours, hourly wages and job descriptions for your clarity
- Application is simple with two clicks
- You can start working one shift at a time without any commitments

Whether you’re a student, looking for part-time work or simply need a little extra money fast, Giggle is your ideal companion. Try yourself as a waiter, kitchen worker or shop assistant and create the work rhythm matching your personal goals.

With free signup and use, quick profile creation and thousands of available jobs, we can’t think of any reason to not give the app a try.

Fax from your iPhone internationally — send and receive faxes quickly and easily! Turn your device into a portable fax and print machine for your pocket.

Save time by avoiding trips to fax offices and the use of outdated machines.
- Send documents and files on the go to any of your smartphone contacts, or add a recipient manually.
- Receive faxes directly on your iPhone and turn it into your personal fax inbox, accessible anytime.
- Print your documents directly from the app with just a few taps.

■ KEY FEATURES: 

› SEND ANY TYPE OF FILE
Upload and send documents in the most common formats (PDF, JPEG, DOC, DOCX, TXT, XLS and XLXS).
Best possible fax quality for all document types. 
Deliver faxes to up to 5 addresses at the same time.

› RECEIVE FAXES ON YOUR DEVICE
Get your own dedicated fax number and receive faxes anywhere, anytime.
View incoming faxes within the app, save them and keep your digital records organized.
No need for a physical machine — just your phone.

› PRINT DOCUMENTS
Send your documents directly to a printer from the app.
Works with all major printer brands, including Canon, Epson, HP, Brother, Kodak, Samsung and more.

› UNLIMITED UPLOAD OPTIONS 
Directly scan documents with your camera. 
Upload images from your media and photo library.
Add files from your document archives.

› GET NOTIFICATIONS
Get instant notifications when your fax has been successfully sent or if there have been any errors during the process. 
Receive alerts when a new fax has arrived in your inbox.

› ADD A COVER PAGE TO YOUR FAXES
Include a cover page when sending files to provide more information.
Add a text message to your fax.
Quickly and easily fill in our professional template with the name and contact of the recipient.

› POWERFUL TRACKING
Track and manage all your faxes in chronological order. 
Review your sent documents and the faxes which are currently being sent. 
Check important information such as fax number, sending status, fax time and date.
Access your received faxes at any time and download or share them when needed.

■ MORE INFO: 

Activate and cancel your subscription according to your needs.

As a Wolt Courier Partner, you earn money by delivering food & more from local businesses to people’s homes. Choose your own hours and enjoy the freedom!

Deliver in the evenings, for a few hours during lunches – or whenever you feel like it. The app makes your life with Wolt easy. It gives you clear live updates on where you can pick up your next deliveries and how much money you’ve earned.

Work part time, full time or in your spare time. Jump in whenever you want, you earn more for delivering more. Longer delivery jobs bring in more cash. All tips are of course yours to keep as well. Freedom and flexibility? Check. Scooter, car, bike – you decide! As a Wolt Courier Partner, you’ll be your own boss. 

We also have a dedicated team of wonderful, friendly people in courier partner support working hard at all times. They are happy to help you with any questions you might have before, during or after delivering.

MoneyRoad is a modern finance tracking app designed to help you take control of your money and build a clear financial path. With a clean interface, smart analytics, and powerful visualization tools, you can easily understand where your money goes and how to reach your goals faster.

Key Features:

RoadMap  — Get a complete overview of your financial health. See your total balance, spending by category, monthly budget progress, and goal achievements all in one place.

Transactions — View, filter, and manage all your income and expenses with ease. Add new transactions in one tap, edit existing ones, and stay organized effortlessly.

Goals — Set personal financial goals like “Vacation,” “New phone,” or “Emergency fund.” Track progress visually and automate your savings with scheduled contributions.

Insights & Profile — Analyze your monthly expenses, select your currency, compare income and spending trends, and receive practical tips to improve your financial habits.

With MoneyRoad, you get a clear view of your finances, smart tools to stay on track, and the motivation to achieve financial freedom. Your journey to better money management starts here.

ScanGuru is a scanner app that will turn your phone into the powerful tiny scanner that fits in your pocket!

Scan, edit, sign and share any document in PDF or JPEG. With our scanner you don’t need an Internet connection as all scans are stored locally on your device.

Become even more productive with e-sign and OCR. Add your signature to scanned documents with just a few taps in scanner pro. Use text recognition to convert any scan into text.

Advanced scanner features:
- Sign documents in a few taps
- OCR (convert any scan into text)
- Translate scanned documents
- Annotate PDFs by highlighting text
- Export to Word in one tap
- Save your scans in black and white, grayscale or color
- Highlight the key points of your scans.
- Scan to high-quality PDF or JPEG
- Multipage scanning - scan as many pages as you need
- Automatic shutter and border detection for any scannable object
- Protect your scans with Touch/Face ID or pin code

Use our free scanner app to scan anything you need:
- IDs, business documents, agreements, letters, invoices, order sheets, receipts
- Paper notes and sketches
- Any articles and book pages
- Business cards
- Rentals, credit notes, bills or any other printed documents

Share your scanned documents via:
- Email or messengers as PDF, JPEG
- Print your scans with any Wi-Fi printer
- Save scans to Camera Roll

A Magyar Posta Zrt. alkalmazásával több, népszerű postai szolgáltatást is elérhet a telefonjáról:

- Szkennelje be csomagja vonalkódját, és kövesse végig a kézbesítés útját, melyről a címzettnek értesítést is küldhet!
- Számítsa ki belföldi és nemzetközi küldeményeinek pontos költségeit a levél és csomag díjkalkulátorral!
- Keresse meg az Önhöz legközelebb található postát, PostaPontot, Csomagautomatát vagy Csekkbefizető automatát könnyen és gyorsan!
- A szolgáltatáskeresővel már közműszolgáltatásokra is szűrhet!
- Regisztráljon az ÉnPostám szolgáltatásra, és vegye igénybe kényelmi szolgáltatásainkat, vagy ellenőrizze hűségpontjait!
- Ellenőrizze a közterületek irányítószámát, hogy minden küldeményét pontosan címezhesse meg!
- Fizesse be csekkjeit elektronikusan! Az applikációban közvetlen linket talál az iCsekk applikációhoz!
- Az alkalmazás angol nyelven is használható!

Az alkalmazás futtatásához minimum iPhone 5-ös készülék és iOS 10.3 operációs rendszer szükséges.

English:
Magyar Posta Zrt.'s mobile application gives you access to the Hungarian Post's most popular services on the go!
 
- Scan your postal package's barcode and track it all the way through shipping! Send update notices to the recipient!
- Find the nearest post office, PostaPont, automated package machine or cheque machine easily, or filter through all our available services!
- Calculate the prices of your domestic and international mailing items!
- Check zip codes so you can address mailing items correctly!
- Register on ÉnPostám (MyPost) and take advantage of a wide range of services or check your loyalty card points!
- Pay your bills electronically! The application contains a direct link to the iCsekk app!
 
iPhone5 and iOS 10.3 operating system is required to run!

developer: Microsec Szamitastechnikai Fejleszto zartkoruen mukodo Reszvenytarsasag
description:
e-Szignó – Electronic signatures made simple, anywhere, anytime

e-Szignó is a unique mobile application that allows you to create legally binding documents without paper or pen. No more printing, handwritten signature, mailing, or scanning. With e-Szignó, signing is easy, fast, and digital.

Why will you like e-Szignó?
• Sign contracts, and official documents anytime, anywhere, paper-free.
• Create fully legally binding documents using the qualified electronic signature.
• 100% compliant with Hungarian legislation and the EU eIDAS regulation.
• Supports all widely used e-signature formats (e.g., ASiC, e-akta) in addition to PDFs.
• Every copy of the e-signed document is equally valid.
• Sign even hundreds of pages in just seconds.
• Multiple signers can sign a document, and the signing order can be pre-set.
• Signing is possible via mobile phone or computer – using a QR code or by accepting a push notification.

Microsec – We Build Trust
The e-Szignó is powered by Microsec, with 20 years of experience, Hungary’s first eIDAS-qualified trust service provider. Microsec’s services are supervised by the National Media and Infocommunications Authority (NMHH) and are listed in the EU’s trusted list. microsec.hu

Discover your next job opportunity on Indeed, the free job search app designed to connect you with better work anytime, anywhere.

Forget the other job search apps. With 12 jobs added every second and smart search filters to quickly home in on your ideal role, your next job is at your fingertips.

Whether you're casually browsing or urgently applying, Indeed has the jobs you want, all in one place, with advanced functionality to help you find work that meets your needs and easily apply from your device. 

• Search the comprehensive database to find jobs, which includes employment opportunities posted on other job search sites, and explore recommended roles based on your preferences and work experience

• Upload your CV or use Indeed’s CV builder to show your best self to employers and let your next job find you

• Apply with your saved CV to avoid rewriting the same information for each job application during your job search

• Keep track of applications during your job search and get notifications when an employer has read and responded to your application on Indeed

• Understand what employees think about their workplace with more than 700 million company ratings and reviews

• Find out how much a job pays before you apply with more than 1.1 billion salaries searchable by job title, company and location

• Find jobs with flexible work options using our smart search filters, including: remote jobs, side jobs, freelance jobs, government jobs, part-time jobs, and jobs that allow you to work from home or work from anywhere.

No matter where you are in your career, our job search app lets you show your best self, from application to interview. At Indeed, we help people get jobs.

By downloading this app, you agree to Indeed's Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service found at uk.indeed.com/legal, where you may avail of your rights at any time, including the right to object to the legitimate interest use of your personal data for marketing purposes. You further agree that by downloading this app, Indeed may process, analyse and record any and all activities you take while using the app and any and all interactions and communications you have with, on, or through the app. We do so in order to optimise user experience and achieve the proper functioning of the app. In order to provide you with certain services and support ad attribution, user data, such as your IP address or other unique identifier and event data related to the installation of the Indeed App, may be shared with certain service providers when you download or install this app.
This is performed for the legitimate interest of allowing Indeed to understand and optimise our users' complete customer journey by:

• helping us understand how users arrive to Indeed;
• better measuring the performance of our ads;
• facilitating user logins through third-party accounts in certain cases; and
• helping us understand where a user accesses Indeed through different devices

Please send feedback to ios@indeed.com

Do not sell my personal information: uk.indeed.com/legal/ccpa-dns

- Secure Your Data: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your information is safe and protected.

Spreadsheets 7 is the go-to app for anyone who relies on spreadsheets to manage, analyze, and present data. Whether you're a business professional, student, or just someone who loves working with numbers, Spreadsheets 7 has you covered.

Google Chat is the best way for teams using Workspace to connect, collaborate and get things done.

AI-first messaging and collaboration, transformed by Gemini
• Stay on top of things with conversation summaries
• Automatically translate messages across more than 120 languages
• Find what you're looking for with AI-powered search
• Capture action items so that the whole team is on the same page

Everything teams need to stay connected and get work done
• Start a chat with a colleague, a group or even your whole team
• Tell your team when you're heads-down or ready to connect with personalised status updates
• Share detailed updates with audio and video messages
• Connect in real time, any time with huddles

The full power of Workspace to transform your teamwork
• Integrated with Workspace apps like Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Tasks and Meet

• Stay on top of requests, comments and approvals with the Google Drive app for Chat

Secure

• Migrate away from insecure legacy platforms

Chat is included as part of Google Workspace for consumer, education and business customers.

The new Straighten tool fixes pages that come out curved or tilted while you scan. It lines everything up automatically so your PDFs look neat and professional, with no extra steps needed.

Adobe Scan is free to download and turns your mobile device into a powerful PDF and document scanner that helps you create, save, and organise your paper documents as digital files.

6 WAYS TO USE ADOBE SCAN
1) Save time with a fast document scanner: Use High-speed scan to bulk scan documents and turn stacks into PDFs in seconds.

2) Make a PDF with your phone: Convert paper documents or printed images into PDFs or JPEGs with the mobile PDF and photo scanner.

3) Clean up scans with Magic eraser: Remove thumbs, stains and creases so your document scans look clear and professional.

4) Use the Extract pages tool to choose the pages you need from any multi-page scan and save them as a new PDF.

5) Turn images to text: Use image to text to make words in your scans searchable and editable with OCR.

6) Scan anything: Receipts, IDs, notes, recipes, photos, business cards, whiteboards – scan documents into PDF or JPEG files you can work with on your phone, tablet, or computer.

CAPTURE WITH PRECISION
• Advanced image to text technology detects borders, sharpens content, and makes your scans editable and searchable.

ENHANCE YOUR SCANS
• Edit in text lets you scan words, and handwritten text, to make it editable.
• The Modify tool helps you crop, rotate, resize, and adjust colours in your scans.
• Reorder pages and preview before saving.
• Adjust the brightness and contrast of your scans in just a few taps.

ORGANISE YOUR DOCUMENTS
• Scan paperwork and create custom folders for work documents, personal files, school forms, or ID scans. 
• Contact details are pulled straight from business cards with image to text, so you can save them to your phone contacts in seconds.
• Scans are automatically saved to Adobe Document Cloud for instant access and sharing.

SMART LIBRARY
• This powerful doc scanner finds documents and receipts in your photo library and turns them into PDF.
• Touch up scans or photos directly from your camera roll.

REUSE & SHARE
• Make high-quality PDFs that unlock text from images – from scanned contracts to study notes – so you can copy, edit, and reuse.
• Export your scans to Word, Excel, or PowerPoint for new formats, then share.

DO MORE WITH ACROBAT READER
• Open your PDF scan in Acrobat Reader to comment, highlight, fill forms, and sign documents.
• Access and share securely across Scan, Reader, and Acrobat on web and mobile.

IN-APP PURCHASE
• Subscribe for even more scanning power. Subscriptions work across Scan and Reader mobile apps and Acrobat on the web.
• Combine scans into one file so you can take multiple scans and consolidate into one document.
• Increase OCR capacity from 25 to 100 pages so that you can find text in multiple images.

Download this free mobile scanner to convert important photos and documents into PDF and JPEG files to help you stay organised. Adobe Scan is the PDF converter trusted by millions worldwide

developer: XSTUDIOS BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI REKLAMCILIK ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Looking for a Scanner App?

Discover the most advanced all-in-one Scanner App! Turn your mobile device into a powerful, portable scanner that automatically recognizes text (OCR). Download this free PDF scanner app to instantly scan, edit, sign, save, and share documents in PDF, JPG, Word, or TXT formats.

Say goodbye to bulky copy machines and embrace a paper-free life with this ultra-fast, ad-free scanner app. All your scanned documents are securely stored on your device—never sent to external servers.

Available for iPhone and iPad!


FEATURES

1. FREE PDF & DOCUMENT SCANNER APP
Perfect for students and professionals, this powerful scanner app uses your device’s camera to digitize all kinds of paper documents: receipts, notes, invoices, whiteboard discussions, business cards, certificates, and more.

2. OPTIMIZE SCAN QUALITY
Enjoy smart cropping and auto-enhancing features that ensure your photo scans are clear and sharp, with premium colors and resolutions.

3. VARIOUS SCANNING MODES
Document Scanner: Scan physical paper documents with 100% precision using the state-of-the-art auto side detection feature, converting them into PDF files.
ID Card & Passport Scanner: Quickly and easily scan ID documents with this dedicated mode.
Cam Scanner: Use your camera to scan in real-time with the CamScanner feature.

4. PDF CONVERTER
PDF Converter: Create PDFs from anything and convert documents in multiple formats to PDF.
Photo to PDF: Capture photos and convert them into PDF files.
Image to PDF: Upload images and convert them into PDFs.
Picture to PDF: Take pictures and convert them into PDFs.
Scan to PDF: Scan any paper document and convert it into a PDF file.
Supported formats: PDF, JPG, DOC, DOCX, TXT, XLS, XLSM, XLSX, CSV, PPT, PPTM, PPTX.

5. SIGN & STAMP ON THE GO
Need to sign a document quickly? Draw, scan, or import your signature or stamp directly into the app. With just a few taps, you can sign and convert any document into a PDF, ready to share instantly.

6. SHARE PDF/JPEG FILES
Easily export and share PDFs, JPEGs, or Word files via social media, email, and more.

7. BATCH SCANNING BRILLIANCE
Scan multiple pages or documents simultaneously with our efficient batch scanning mode, boosting productivity and saving you time.

8. BUILT-IN PDF EDITOR
Polish your scans effortlessly with our built-in editor, offering features like cropping, brightness adjustment, contrast tuning, text extraction, text editing, and more.

9. DATA SECURITY
Rest easy knowing your data is private. All documents are stored and processed only on your device, with no uploads to servers. We ensure 100% data security by restricting any outgoing data, making this app the most secure choice for your files.

Easily convert a document to PDF or convert photo to PDF with our powerful photo to PDF app. Quickly convert image to PDF, picture to PDF, or jpg to PDF in just a few taps. Need to convert PDF to JPG or convert PDF to image? Our app makes pdf to jpg and pdf to image conversions effortless. Whether you want to convert a document to PDF, convert jpg to PDF, or simply convert photo to PDF, this photo to PDF converter has you covered.

How to convert a photo to PDF or turn a PDF into an image? There’s the answer!
Download Scanner App now to securely scan, sign, and convert any document into a PDF.
